drop7.title: Drop7 Simulator
drop7.text: A simulator to find the optimal move in the iPhone game Drop7.

swahili-translator.title: Swahili Translator
swahili-translator.subtitle: An English-to-Swahili translator built with Mathematica.
swahili-translator.description: My first attempt at natural language translation.

text-daemon.title: Text Daemon
text-daemon.text: A command-line utility for sending and receiving text messages through a Google Voice number.

waldo-finder.title: There's Waldo
waldo-finder.subtitle: Using Mathematica's image processing capabilities to find Waldo in a Where's Waldo image.
waldo-finder.description: Mathematica's image processing functions can be used to isolate regions in an image that match Waldo's signature red striped shirt.
